quoteText: <li>use any means to "scrape," "crawl," or "spider" any web pages contained in the Site
title: Spidering or crawling is not allowed

tosdr.case: Spidering or crawling is not allowed
tosdr.tldr:
Full quote: "you may not and agree that you will not: violate any law or regulation; violate or infringe other people's intellectual property, privacy, publicity, or other legal rights; use our Site or Services to transmit, distribute, post or submit any information concerning any other person or entity, including without limitation, photographs or personal contact information of others without their permission; transmit anything that is illegal, abusive, defamatory, harassing, harmful to reputation, pornographic, indecent, profane, obscene, hateful, racist, or otherwise objectionable; send unsolicited or unauthorized advertising or commercial communications, such as spam;stalk, harass, or harm another individual; impersonate or misrepresent your affiliation with someone else;
use any means to "scrape," "crawl," or "spider" any web pages contained in the Site"
